title: (x) The Amazing Race logo squarish sans caps - Eurostile Extd {Lex}
content:
I’d like to find out what font is being used for the logo of “The Amazing Race”. Your help is appreciated.

Glen
author: gwebster

comments.content:
Do you mean this? [http://amazing.race.inreview.com/amazing\_race.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090526221148/http:/amazing.race.inreview.com/amazing_race.jpg "http://amazing.race.inreview.com/amazing\_race.jpg")

It’s Eurostile. It helps if you post a sample in the future.

- Lex
